ModMetaData.name: Zhul Bearded Tribe
ModMetaData.author: Boutte1789
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the Zhul tribe - a cannibal-worshipping faction with elaborate beard rituals. These olive-gray skinned humanoids sport flamboyant spiraling beards that signify their status and spiritual power. They practice sacred cannibalism, believing that consuming enemy flesh absorbs the strength of souls.
Features: - Custom alien race with unique 2048px ultra-high-res body sprites - Forced brown curly beards on all male pawns - Cannibal traits with special dietary requirements - Ritual feast mechanics and mood effects - Hostile tribal faction with 3 specialized warrior types - HAR framework compatible - works alongside other alien races - Rich lore and cultural depth
The Zhul believe they sprang from a cosmic beard-shaped comet and maintain their elaborate facial hair through daily grooming rituals with scented oils made from jungle orchids.
